text: [SSZ1] SAROGLOU, I. SOPRUNOV AND A. ZVAVITCH, Characterization of simplices via the Bezout inequality for mixed volumes, Proc. Amer. Math. Soc., 144 (2016), no. 12, 5333- 5340.
